title: Interview with Dr. Jenny Thatcher
description: In this episode, Matthew interviews Dr. Jenny Thatcher from The University of East London. In part one Jenny explains her dislike of school leading to an unexpected route into Sociology and academia. In part 2 Jenny discusses her ethnographic research at a bridal store and her current research in a London pub.
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
